product_desc: Medical search engine and content curation platform for clinicians, researchers, biotech and pharmaceutical organizations.  We aggregate biomedical literature, clinical trials, medical conferences, industry news, regulatory announcements, social media, and scientific activity of the worlds leading medical experts.  We are currently focused in oncology and dermatology but rapidly expanding into new therapeutic areas.
high_concept: Pharmaceutical and Biotech Medical Discovery Platform
name: mdpress.com
